verses.verse: הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var The word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Ya-hu, that came to Jeremiah אֶ֚ל <S%H413><s%> 'el about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַיְּהוּדִ֔ים <S%H3064><s%> hai-ye-hu-Dim, concerning all the Jews הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-she-Vim which dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt הַיֹּשְׁבִ֤ים <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-she-Vim which dwell בְּמִגְדֹּל֙ <S%H4024><s%> be-mig-Dol at Migdol וּבְתַחְפַּנְחֵ֣ס <S%H8471><s%> u-ve-tach-pan-Ches and at Tahpanhes וּבְנֹ֔ף <S%H5297><s%> u-ve-Nof, and at Noph וּבְאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> u-ve-'E-retz and in the country פַּתְר֖וֹס <S%H6624><s%> pat-Ros of Pathros לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying ס sa-Mek

כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'Ot of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you רְאִיתֶ֗ם <S%H7200><s%> re-'i-Tem, Ye have seen אֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָֽרָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Ah all the evil אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher i הֵבֵ֙אתִי֙ <S%H935><s%> he-Ve-ti that I have brought עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-Ru-sha-Lim, upon Jerusalem וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei and upon all the cities יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah וְהִנָּ֤ם <S%H2005><s%> ve-hin-Nam are in חָרְבָּה֙ <S%H2723><s%> cha-re-Bah they [are] a desolation הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom and behold this day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein and no בָּהֶ֖ם ba-Hem יוֹשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev. and no man dwelleth

מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei Because רָעָתָ֗ם <S%H7451><s%> ra-'a-Tam, of their wickedness אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su which they have committed לְהַכְעִסֵ֔נִי <S%H3707><s%> le-hach-'i-Se-ni, to provoke me to anger לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet continuing לְקַטֵּ֔ר <S%H6999><s%> le-kat-Ter, to burn incense לַעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> la-'a-Vod [and] to serve לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <S%H312><s%> 'a-che-Rim; other אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יְדָע֔וּם <S%H3045><s%> ye-da-'Um, whom they knew הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah like אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you וַאֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> va-'a-vo-tei-Chem. not [neither] they ye nor your fathers

וָאֶשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> va-'esh-Lach Howbeit I sent אֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עֲבָדַ֣י <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dai unto you all my servants הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> han-ne-vi-'Im, the prophets הַשְׁכֵּ֥ים <S%H7925><s%> hash-Keim rising early וְשָׁלֹ֖חַ <S%H7971><s%> ve-sha-Lo-ach and sending לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; [them] saying אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> na Oh תַעֲשׂ֗וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su, Oh do אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> 'et דְּבַֽר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- thing הַתֹּעֵבָ֥ה <S%H8441><s%> hat-to-'e-Vah not this abominable הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot likewise אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which שָׂנֵֽאתִי׃ <S%H8130><s%> sa-Ne-ti. that I hate

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo did not שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> sha-me-'U But they hearkened וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- or הִטּ֣וּ <S%H5186><s%> hit-Tu not nor inclined אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָזְנָ֔ם <S%H241><s%> 'a-ze-Nam, their ear לָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> la-Shuv to turn מֵרָֽעָתָ֑ם <S%H7451><s%> me-ra-'a-Tam; from their wickedness לְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti not קַטֵּ֖ר <S%H6999><s%> kat-Ter to burn no incense לֵאלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִֽים׃ <S%H312><s%> 'a-che-Rim. unto other

וַתִּתַּ֤ךְ <S%H5413><s%> vat-tit-Tach was poured forth חֲמָתִי֙ <S%H2534><s%> cha-ma-Ti Wherefore my fury וְאַפִּ֔י <S%H639><s%> ve-'ap-Pi, and mine anger וַתִּבְעַר֙ <S%H1197><s%> vat-tiv-'Ar and was kindled בְּעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> be-'a-Rei in the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וּבְחֻצ֖וֹת <S%H2351><s%> u-ve-chu-Tzot and in the streets יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim; of Jerusalem וַתִּהְיֶ֛ינָה <S%H1961><s%> vat-tih-Yei-nah have לְחָרְבָּ֥ה <S%H2723><s%> le-cha-re-Bah and they are wasted לִשְׁמָמָ֖ה <S%H8077><s%> lish-ma-Mah [and] desolate כַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> kai-Yom as at this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. is this ס sa-Mek

וְעַתָּ֡ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore now thus saith יְהוָה֩ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֨י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei the God צְבָא֜וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לָמָה֩ <S%H4100><s%> la-Mah Why אַתֶּ֨ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem are you עֹשִׂ֜ים <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sim Wherefore commit רָעָ֤ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah evil גְדוֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah ye [this] great אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to נַפְשֹׁ֣תֵכֶ֔ם <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sho-te-Chem, against your souls לְהַכְרִ֨ית <S%H3772><s%> le-hach-Rit to cut off לָכֶ֧ם la-Chem אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- from you man וְאִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> ve-'ish-Shah and woman עוֹלֵ֥ל <S%H5768><s%> o-Lel child וְיוֹנֵ֖ק <S%H3243><s%> ve-yo-Nek and suckling מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch out יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah לְבִלְתִּ֛י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti without הוֹתִ֥יר <S%H3498><s%> ho-Tir to leave לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem שְׁאֵרִֽית׃ <S%H7611><s%> she-'e-Rit. you none to remain

לְהַכְעִסֵ֙נִי֙ <S%H3707><s%> le-hach-'i-Se-ni In that ye provoke me unto wrath בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣י <S%H4639><s%> be-ma-'a-Sei with the works יְדֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei-Chem, of your hands לְקַטֵּ֞ר <S%H6999><s%> le-kat-Ter burning incense לֵאלֹהִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִים֙ <S%H312><s%> 'a-che-Rim unto other בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you בָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> ba-'Im whither ye be gone לָג֣וּר <S%H1481><s%> la-Gur to dwell שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham; in it לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an so הַכְרִ֣ית <S%H3772><s%> hach-Rit that ye might cut yourselves off לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, וּלְמַ֤עַן <S%H4616><s%> u-le-Ma-'an so הֱיֽוֹתְכֶם֙ <S%H1961><s%> he-yot-Chem and become לִקְלָלָ֣ה <S%H7045><s%> lik-la-Lah and that ye might be a curse וּלְחֶרְפָּ֔ה <S%H2781><s%> u-le-cher-Pah, and a reproach בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol all גּוֹיֵ֥י <S%H1471><s%> go-Yei among all the nations הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. the land

הַֽשְׁכַחְתֶּם֩ <S%H7911><s%> hash-chach-Tem Have ye forgotten אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רָע֨וֹת <S%H7451><s%> ra-'ot the wickedness אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-tei-Chem of your fathers וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et רָע֣וֹת׀ <S%H7451><s%> ra-'ot and the wickedness מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei of the kings יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et רָע֣וֹת <S%H7451><s%> ra-'ot and the wickedness נָשָׁ֔יו <S%H802><s%> na-Shav, of their wives וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et רָעֹ֣תֵכֶ֔ם <S%H7451><s%> ra-'O-te-Chem, and your own wickedness וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et רָעֹ֣ת <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ot and the wickedness נְשֵׁיכֶ֑ם <S%H802><s%> ne-shei-Chem; of your wives אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su which they have committed בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וּבְחֻצ֖וֹת <S%H2351><s%> u-ve-chu-Tzot and in the streets יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim. Jerusalem

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor דֻכְּא֔וּ <S%H1792><s%> duk-ke-'U, They are not humbled עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom [even] unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; to this וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor יָרְא֗וּ <S%H3372><s%> ya-re-'U, neither have they feared וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor הָלְכ֤וּ <S%H1980><s%> ha-le-Chu nor walked בְתֽוֹרָתִי֙ <S%H8451><s%> ve-to-ra-Ti in my law וּבְחֻקֹּתַ֔י <S%H2708><s%> u-ve-chuk-ko-Tai, nor in my statutes אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti that I set לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Chem before וְלִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> ve-lif-Nei you and before אֲבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> a-vo-tei-Chem. your fathers ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, Therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'Ot of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni I am going שָׂ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> sam Behold I will set פָּנַ֛י <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nai my face בָּכֶ֖ם ba-Chem לְרָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> le-ra-'Ah; against you for evil וּלְהַכְרִ֖ית <S%H3772><s%> u-le-hach-Rit and to cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. all Judah

וְלָקַחְתִּ֞י <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ti And I will take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> she-'e-Rit the remnant יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who שָׂ֨מוּ <S%H7760><s%> Sa-mu that have set פְנֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H6440><s%> fe-nei-Hem their faces לָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> la-Vo to go אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> 'e-retz- into the land מִצְרַיִם֮ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-ra-Yim of Egypt לָג֣וּר <S%H1481><s%> la-Gur to sojourn שָׁם֒ <S%H8033><s%> sham there וְתַ֨מּוּ <S%H8552><s%> ve-Tam-mu there and they shall all be consumed כֹ֜ל <S%H3605><s%> chol will all בְּאֶ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרַ֣יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt יִפֹּ֗לוּ <S%H5307><s%> yip-Po-lu, [and] fall בַּחֶ֤רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ba-Che-rev by the sword בָּֽרָעָב֙ <S%H7458><s%> ba-ra-'Av [and] by the famine יִתַּ֔מּוּ <S%H8552><s%> yit-Tam-mu, they shall [even] be consumed מִקָּטֹן֙ <S%H6996><s%> mik-ka-Ton from the least וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- against גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol, even unto the greatest בַּחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ba-Che-rev by the sword וּבָרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> u-va-ra-'Av and by the famine יָמֻ֑תוּ <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mu-tu; they shall die וְהָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu will become לְאָלָ֣ה <S%H423><s%> le-'a-Lah and they shall be an execration לְשַׁמָּ֔ה <S%H8047><s%> le-sham-Mah, [and] an astonishment וְלִקְלָלָ֖ה <S%H7045><s%> ve-lik-la-Lah and a curse וּלְחֶרְפָּֽה׃ <S%H2781><s%> u-le-cher-Pah. and a reproach

וּפָקַדְתִּ֗י <S%H6485><s%> u-fa-kad-Ti, For I will punish עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al and הַיּֽוֹשְׁבִים֙ <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-she-Vim them that dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher I פָּקַ֖דְתִּי <S%H6485><s%> pa-Kad-ti as I have punished עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim; Jerusalem בַּחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ba-Che-rev by the sword בָּרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> ba-ra-'Av by the famine וּבַדָּֽבֶר׃ <S%H1698><s%> u-vad-Da-ver. and by the pestilence
